casebody.data:
Paull ANDERSON
v.
Julius Jennings WADE, Jr., James H. Wade, Margaret L. Godley, Godley, Inc., and Wade and Wade, Attorneys at Law. No. 315P04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2005. Paull Anderson, Pro Se. William K. Diehl, Jr., Charlotte, for Margaret Godley & Godley, Inc. John S. Arrowood, Michael F. Schultze, Charlotte, for Wades and Wade and Wade.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 16th day of February 2005 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Mecklenburg County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of April 2005."
